trigger: Handrail height on stairways is less than 34 inches or greater than 38 inches
action_item: Adjust or replace handrail to meet code-required height.
documentation: Photo of measurement and completed work.

trigger: Attic insulation blocks soffit vents or reduces airflow
action_item: Install baffles or adjust insulation to maintain clear airflow from soffit to attic.
documentation: Photo of baffles and vent area.

trigger: Gaps or cracks in foundation greater than 1/4 inch
action_item: Seal foundation gaps with appropriate material before insulation or air sealing.

trigger: Bath fan not accessible for service or cleaning
action_item: Relocate or install access panel for bath fan per code.

trigger: Combustion water heater located in bedroom or bathroom
action_item: Relocate water heater or convert to direct vent/sealed combustion.
documentation: Photo and relocation or conversion documentation.

trigger: No means of venting excess moisture in crawlspace
action_item: Install code-compliant vents or mechanical system.

trigger: Mobile home skirting missing or significantly damaged
action_item: Install or repair skirting to prevent animal/insect entry.

trigger: No condensate trap on high-efficiency furnace
action_item: Install trap per manufacturer specification.

trigger: Attic access less than 22x30 inches or not code-compliant
action_item: Modify access or refer for correction before proceeding.

trigger: Uninsulated ductwork in unconditioned space
action_item: Insulate ducts to minimum R-8 per IHWAP.

trigger: House has unvented gas log fireplace
action_item: ⚠️🛑 Defer project until fireplace is removed or made code compliant.

trigger: Mechanical room or closet does not allow required clearance for servicing appliances
action_item: Modify area to allow code-minimum service clearance.

trigger: Return air pathway blocked or undersized for HVAC system
action_item: Clear and resize return air to meet manufacturer's requirements.

trigger: Damaged or missing crawlspace door
action_item: Install code-compliant crawlspace door with weather seal.

trigger: Clothes dryer vent not equipped with backdraft damper
action_item: Install code-compliant backdraft damper.

trigger: Accessible bathroom lacks grab bars as required
action_item: Install ADA-compliant grab bars.

trigger: Floor in mobile/manufactured home soft or shows signs of rot
action_item: Repair or replace floor to meet structural standards.

trigger: Water heater T&P discharge does not terminate within 6 inches of floor or drain
action_item: Correct termination per code.

trigger: Visible gaps between chimney and roof or exterior wall
action_item: Seal gaps with code-approved flashing or sealant.

trigger: Kitchen range hood not vented to exterior (recirculating only)
action_item: Install or upgrade to exterior-vented range hood.

trigger: Insulation installed over knob and tube wiring
action_item: ⚠️🛑 Defer attic or wall insulation until knob and tube is removed.

trigger: Furnace installed in attic lacks code-compliant platform or clearance
action_item: Install platform and provide required clearance.

trigger: Improper venting or cross-connection between kitchen and bath exhausts
action_item: Correct venting to ensure independent exhausts.

trigger: Moisture stains or mold on ceiling below bathroom or kitchen
action_item: Investigate and repair leak; remediate mold per protocol.
documentation: Photo of stained/moldy area, repair record.

trigger: Detached or hanging gutter creates trip hazard at entry/exit
action_item: Repair or reattach gutter to remove hazard.

trigger: Disconnected downspout causes erosion at foundation
action_item: Reattach and extend downspout to proper discharge point.

trigger: Crawlspace access below grade and subject to flooding
action_item: Install raised, watertight crawlspace entry.

trigger: No exterior lighting at required egress doors
action_item: Install code-compliant exterior light fixture.

trigger: Foundation drain not present or not functioning
action_item: Install or repair foundation drain to direct water away from building.

trigger: No lock on crawlspace access door
action_item: Install code-compliant locking hardware.

trigger: Guardrails missing or non-compliant at stair or deck
action_item: Install guardrails to meet code height and spacing requirements.

trigger: Improperly sloped exterior grade directs water toward foundation
action_item: Regrade exterior to slope water away from home.

trigger: Electric meter base loose or not properly secured
action_item: Secure meter base per utility and code requirements.

trigger: Multiple families sharing single utility meter in violation of program rules
action_item: Defer project; refer to agency/program manager for eligibility.

trigger: Window security bars installed without code-required quick release
action_item: Install quick-release device or remove bars.
documentation: Photo of bars and release mechanism.

trigger: No address numbers posted on building exterior
action_item: Install address numbers per code.

trigger: Loose or damaged handrail on stairs
action_item: Repair or replace handrail to restore stability.

trigger: Improper window or door flashing causing moisture entry
action_item: Repair or install flashing to direct water away from openings.
documentation: Photo of flashing before and after.
